subject: Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Shawne Williams was suspended one game for throwing a punch in an altercation in a game against the Atlanta Hawks. In the same game, Amar’e Stoudemire was injured.
snippet: Shawne Williams was suspended one game for throwing a punch in an altercation in a game against the Atlanta Hawks. In the same game, Amar’e Stoudemire was injured.
